name: lob
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to throw something so that it goes high in the air in a curve: Police started lobbing (= throwing) tear gas canisters into the crowd.

(in some sports) to hit, kick, or throw the ball high in the air so that it goes over the head of your opponent : The goalkeeper had come out of the goal and Webster lobbed the ball over his head into the empty net.
